caption.p: Docking of alogliptin to the Mpro structure 6M2N ( A, C) and to the DPP-4 structure 4FFW ( B, D). Distances between the interacting amino acids are shown in ( A, B). Distances within the molecule of the inhibitor are shown in ( C, D). Colors indicate participation in hydrophobic interactions (yellow), pi interactions (dark yellow), hydrogen bonds (light green), polar interactions (dark green), and halogen bonds (blue).
